duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality customer service in a remote work environment, representing the company in a positive and professional manner.
Handle appointment setting and customer inquiries for automotive and dealership services.
Navigate dual screen, multi-tab, and multiple platform programs efficiently while guiding phone conversations and taking notes during the calls.
Effectively communicate using proper English and grammar in both one-on-one and team environments.
Manage time and multitask effectively to meet customer service requirements.
